GenericController<T,S extends GenericService<T,ID>,ID extends java.io.Serializable> - Class in org.resthub.web.controller
Generic REST controller It provides 5 generic web services, all usable with XML or JSON serialization : GET on / : returns all entities managed by this controller (pageable, see related documentation) GET on /{id} : returns the entity identified by 'id' POST on / : create a new entity (given in parameter) PUT on /{id} : update an entity (given in parameter) DELETE on /{id} : delete the entity identified by 'id'
